name.jp: 龍の猛る諸手(男の子用)

description.en: A yukata is a Japanese garment, a casual summer kimono usually made of cotton. These hands are for male characters.
description.ar: A yukata is a Japanese garment, a casual summer kimono usually made of cotton. These hands are for male characters.
description.br: Um yukata é uma vestimenta japonesa, um kimono casual de verão geralmente feito de algodão. Essas mãos são para personagens masculinos.
description.cns: 浴衣和服是一种日本服装，这是一种夏季休闲和服，通常由棉制成。 这对手套是给男性角色的。
description.fi: A yukata is a Japanese garment, a casual summer kimono usually made of cotton. These hands are for male characters.
description.fil: A yukata is a Japanese garment, a casual summer kimono usually made of cotton. These hands are for male characters.
description.fr: Un yukata est un kimono japonais décontracté d'été, généralement fait de coton. Ces mains sont pour personnages masculins.
description.id: Yukata adalah pakaian Jepang, kimono musim panas kasual yang biasanya terbuat dari katun. Pakaian ini untuk karakter pria.
description.it: A yukata is a Japanese garment, a casual summer kimono usually made of cotton. These hands are for male characters.
description.jp: 浴衣は日本の衣服で、通常は綿で作られたカジュアルな夏の着物です。
description.kr: 유카타는 일본의 옷으로, 보통면으로 만든 캐주얼 한 여름 기모노입니다. 이 손은 남성 캐릭터 용입니다.
description.nl: A yukata is a Japanese garment, a casual summer kimono usually made of cotton. These hands are for male characters.
description.pl: A yukata is a Japanese garment, a casual summer kimono usually made of cotton. These hands are for male characters.
description.ru: С кимоно не носят перчатки, поэтому этот предмет костюма просто замаскирует надетое на вас снаряжение.
description.sp: Un yukata es una prenda Japonesa, un kimono casual de verano generalmente hecho de algodón. Estas manos son para Personajes Masculinos.
description.sw: A yukata is a Japanese garment, a casual summer kimono usually made of cotton. These hands are for male characters.
description.th: ยูกาตะเป็นเสื้อผ้าญี่ปุ่น ซึ่งเป็นชุดกิโมโนฤดูร้อนแบบสบายๆ ที่มักทำจากผ้าฝ้าย มือเหล่านี้มีไว้สำหรับตัวละครชาย
description.vi: Yukata là một loại quần áo của Nhật Bản, một loại kimono vào mùa hè thường được làm bằng cotton. Bàn tay này dành cho các nhân vật nam.
